Vangrund

Vangrund was one of the nations emerging from the collapse of the The Arthaelean Empire - a kingdom based around the land to the south-east of the The North Sea of Paraesi. It was founded when the church of Solenist Academia presented to the public the boy who would become the first king of Vangrund, Rinus Sangey, who they proclaimed to be of the same blood as the Emperors, and the nearest they would find to the rightful heir to the throne. By all accounts young Rinus Sangey was charismatic, and held a certain religious significance in coming from the Solenist monasteries, where he was kept chaste and groomed for induction into the faith.
